title: Los Pies
subtitle: The Feet
meta_desc: Learn about feet in Spanish (pies, caminar, correr, saltar) with audio pronunciation and word highlighting. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish body parts, los pies Spanish, feet in Spanish, bilingual children books, Spanish vocabulary kids

pages.title: Los Pies
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. A happy toddler sitting on grass looking at their bare feet.

pages.title: Tengo dos pies.
pages.prompt: Warm, child-friendly watercolor illustration, landscape 16:9 format, soft pastel colors. A child wiggling their two bare feet while sitting on a colorful mat.
